summary: Item 1. Business Overview We operate a global marketplace, where hosts offer guests stays and experiences on our platform. We are a community based on connection and belongingâ€”a community that was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country and region across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way. Airbnb has five stakeholders and is designed with all of them in mind.
